# Geo data

Place `countries_110m.json` here for offline country lookup (Natural Earth 110m admin 0 countries GeoJSON).

Download from:
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nvkelso/natural-earth-vector/master/geojson/ne_110m_admin_0_countries.geojson

Save as `countries_110m.json`. If this file is missing, the app will load the same data from CDN.
